warezcdn.name: DanMachi - É errado tentar pegar garotas numa masmorra
warezcdn.title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

imdb.title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
imdb.plot: In the city of Orario, where adventurers hunt monsters in a place called Dungeon, Bell Cranel's life was saved by a swordswoman, who is then become the source of Bell's determination to get stronger.

episodes.title: Play Back (Reminisce)
episodes.plot: Recap of Seasons 1-3 (Episodes 1-37) and a preview of Season 4.

episodes.title: Night Before Departure (Prelude)
episodes.plot: After recovering from his fight with Asterius, Bell learns from Hestia that he has reached level 4 and is warned by Fels that true peace between Orario and the Xenos can be only achieved after someone conquers the Dungeon's bottom level.

episodes.title: The Great Falls
episodes.plot: Bell's team reach the lower levels, and enter the 25th floor. Whilst fighting monsters and collecting materials they spot Luvis, a wounded elf adventurer who is attacked by a huge plant-like monster.

episodes.title: Parasite - Viscum Album
episodes.plot: Unable to extract the Vines, the party discovers that the monster is called "Moss Huge" who evolved after eating the magic stones from other monsters.

episodes.title: Mermaid - The Girl of Water City
episodes.plot: Bell discovers a mermaid called Marie who is a friend of the Xenos that Bell previously met. Despite Marie's warnings, Bell convinces her to guide him back so that he can rejoin the others and fight the Moss Huge.

episodes.title: Argo Vesta - Heroic Slash of Holy Flame
episodes.plot: Empowered by Haruhime's spell, Bell's party fights back the monster horde, until they realize that the Moss Huge's objective was to absorb the magic stones of the monsters they defeated, becoming much stronger.

episodes.title: Rabbit's Foot - Rabbit's Foot
episodes.plot: The Gods hold a 'Denatus', a traditional meeting where they decide on adventurers' aliases. Hestia becomes upset by the interest the other gods take in Bell, who gets the alias 'Rabbit Foot'.

episodes.title: Cassandra Ilion - Dream Seer
episodes.plot: Cassandra has a disturbing premonitory dream. Turk identifies the culprit of the previous night's murder as Ryu, a former adventurer of the Astraea Familia, known as 'The Gale Wind'.

episodes.title: Mirabilis - Chaos
episodes.plot: On the dungeon's 27th floor, Bell and the party led by Bors come upon an ominous sight but continue the hunt for Ryu in spite of the danger.

episodes.title: Lambton - Ill Omen
episodes.plot: Jura Halmar flees but is found by Bell and Ryu. After a tense exchange, Bell confronts Jura who shows his true colors.

episodes.title: Juggernaut -The Destroyer
episodes.plot: On the 25th floor of the Dungeon a monster appears and goes on a rampage. Jura brags about how five years before his familia, the Rudra, set a trap to eliminate the Astrea, Ryu's former familia.

episodes.title: Endless - Brutal
episodes.plot: Ryu runs to Bell's aid and then fights Juggernaut but she is defeated. The monster then attacks Bor's party, killing all save for Bor who manages to escape thanks to Ryu.

episodes.title: Amphisbaena - A Song of Despair
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Wiene A Dragon Girl
episodes.plot: Monsters are evil abominations driven by murderous instinct. But if that were true, why is this one a scared little girl who doesn't understand why she's being hunted?

episodes.title: Monster: A Single Wing
episodes.plot: Who knows what could happen if word of Wiene's existence spread. The Hestia Familia needs answers and soon, but what they discover in the dungeon only raises more questions.

episodes.title: Xenos (Outliers)
episodes.plot: The Guild knows about Wiene. But instead of demanding answers, it assigns the Hestia Familia a mission they cannot refuse. Something awaits them in the dungeon's darkness.

episodes.title: Aspiration (Distant Dream)
episodes.plot: There are others like Wiene, and they call themselves Xenos. Uranus asks much from the Hestia Familia, but if anyone can bridge the gap between species, it's them.

episodes.title: Ikelos Familia (King of Atrocity)
episodes.plot: It was supposed to be the dawning of a new era. But selfish, evil men only care about what they can take for themselves, leaving others to face the consequences.

episodes.title: Knossos (Man-Made Labyrinth)
episodes.plot: Bell shouldn't get involved. But the young adventurer has already decided otherwise. Little does he know that he'll help Fels discover a secret even Uranus doesn't know.

episodes.title: A Dream of Beasts (Dix Perdix)
episodes.plot: Never underestimate the measures a fanatic will take to prove his worldview correct.

episodes.title: The Fool (Bell Cranel)
episodes.plot: The Loki Familia are battle-hardened veterans used to fighting monsters. But this opponent is different.

episodes.title: Stigma (Downfall)
episodes.plot: Ikelos is banished from Orario for his involvement with the poachers, while Bell loses all respect from other adventurers and is comforted by Syr.

episodes.title: Invisible (Forced Breakthrough)
episodes.plot: Anxious since her last meeting with Bell, Eina decides to look for him, but Hermes meets her first and asks for a favor. Later at night, the Hestia Familia begins their plan to help evacuate the Xenos from the city.

episodes.title: Ultra Soul (Decisive Battle)
episodes.plot: While running from Tiona, Wiene rescues a child from harm and Tiona decides to spare her. Bell and Haruhime reunite with Wiene, but Bete appears to stop them. Haruhime stays behind to stop him with Aisha's help.

episodes.title: Argonaut (Hero's Return)
episodes.plot: Forced into combat, Bell must face an old foe.

episodes.title: OVA: Is It Wrong to Crave Hot spring in Orario? (God of the Hot Spring Forever)
episodes.plot: Dian Cecht opens up a bath house in Orario which becomes a huge hit. However, Miach Familia is annoyed due to him stealing the idea from Naaza, with her also believing that his proclamation that it is also a natural hot spring to be a lie.

episodes.title: Party, Banquet of the Gods
episodes.plot: A powerful leader of the Apollo Familia takes notice of him, his life with his Goddess is under threat.

episodes.title: Apollo, Sun God
episodes.plot: Apollo Familia has challenged Hestia, but she refuses. He tries to force her hand.

episodes.title: Conversion, Gathering
episodes.plot: Zanis Lustra imprisons Lilliruca; Hestia Mikoto and Welf attempt to rescue Lilliruca; Ais and Tiona agree to train Bell.

episodes.title: War Game
episodes.plot: The War Game begins; with the help of their magic, Lili, Mikoto and Welf try to neutralize the Apollo Familia and allow Bell to fight.

episodes.title: Home, The Hearthfire Mansion
episodes.plot: After their victory, the Hestia Familia moves to Apollo's former mansion; Chigusa has bad news for Mikoto.

episodes.title: Ishtar Familia, City of Lust
episodes.plot: Bell, Lilliruca, and Welf follow Mikoto to Orario's red-light district; Mikoto searches for an old friend; Haruhime rescues Bell.

episodes.title: Renard, Fox Person
episodes.plot: Bell and the others discover that Haruhime is Mikoto's missing friend; Ishtar sends a team to capture Bell.

episodes.title: Ephemeral Dreams, Killing Stone
episodes.plot: Haruhime helps Bell and Mikoto escape from Ishtar's castle.

episodes.title: Berbera, War Prostitutes
episodes.plot: In a bold act of defiance, Bell and Mikoto hurry to save Haruhime before she can be sacrificed in a ritual by Ishtar and her followers.

episodes.title: Argonaut, Longing to Be a Hero
episodes.plot: Bell fights to protect Haruhime; the Freya Familia launches an attack to destroy the Ishtar Familia.

episodes.title: Rakia, Army's Advance
episodes.plot: Hestia is kidnapped by Ares; Bell and Ais join forces.

episodes.title: Song of Love, Goddess and Child
episodes.plot: Bell, Hestia, and Ais take shelter in a nearby village and are welcomed by the mayor; a mysterious girl appears in the Labyrinth.

episodes.title: OVA: Is It Wrong to go Searching for Herbs on a Deserted Island?
episodes.plot: Micah sends the Hestia familia on a quest to recover some medicinal herbs on "Paradise Island". Hestia, Lili, and Haruhime fight over who should spend time with Bell and choose to decide it with a swimsuit competition.

episodes.title: Adventurer, Bell Cranel
episodes.plot: 1st Level adventurer Bell goes too deep into a dungeon and is saved by a beautiful 5th Level adventuress. The cute goddess that lives in the same house as him is jealous of his interest in this woman.

episodes.title: Monster Festival, Monsterphilia
episodes.plot: Bell's goddess tries to get a better weapon for him. Meanwhile, a mysterious woman plots Bell's destruction.

episodes.title: The Blade of a God, Hestia Knife
episodes.plot: Adventurers hunting escaped monsters. Bell Cranel is fighting monster which is after Hestia.

episodes.title: The Weak, Supporter
episodes.plot: Bel is looking to buy new armor. Also meeting girl Liliruca and teaming up with her.

episodes.title: Magic Book, Grimoire
episodes.plot: Bell and Hestia go to dinner together. Liliruca have problems with her Familia. Bell borrow book about magic.

episodes.title: Reason, Liliruca Arde
episodes.plot: Liliruca remembers her past. Eina talks to Loki trying to find more about Soma Familia. Bell want to help Liliruca.

episodes.title: Sword Princess, Aiz Wallenstein
episodes.plot: Liliruca meet Hestia. Ais return handguard to Bell.

episodes.title: Wanting to Be a Hero, Argonaut
episodes.plot: Bell train both mentally and physically. While improved Minotaur waits for him in dungeon.

episodes.title: Blacksmith, Welf Crozzo
episodes.plot: Bell is level 2 now, and gods will give him new title. While he was trying to buy new armor he meet Welf Crozzo.

episodes.title: Procession of Monsters, Pass Parade
episodes.plot: The middle floors are tougher than Bell dreamed. A desperate party rushes past them and the monsters following them focus their attention on Bell and his comrades!

episodes.title: Labyrinth Utopia, Under Resort
episodes.plot: Bells party is trying to get to the safe zone on floor 18. Search party is trying to find them.

episodes.title: Evil Intentions, Show
episodes.plot: Everybody is relaxing on floor 18. Bell and friends visiting local town. In town there are some adventurers that have grudge against Bell.

episodes.title: The Story of a Familia, Familia Myth
episodes.plot: A powerful monster appears in the 18th floor without warning, leading Bell and the other adventurers to fight for their lives against it.

episodes.title: OVA: Is It Wrong to Expect a Hot Spring in a Dungeon?
episodes.plot: Bell. Hestia and the others find a hidden hot spring on the 18th floor of the dungeon.
